creator: genman@noderunner.net
text:
This class has way too many methods with too many arguments.

Suggest introducing a "ParserState" class or something to hold state and use
this as the method argument.

Also, it's unclear how users register their own converters.  If so, where are
the tests for this?

creator: carnold@apache.org
text: Likely a log4j 2.0 design point.  Marking as WONTFIX.
